title: Legal Ease
description: ASIN: B00CEZ8YIY first updated version found here, second edition found hereJack Sutton was a man who is used to getting his way. So when his mother's will forces his hand, he does the only thing he can. He cuts a deal with the brazen law school student who walks into his office with a proposition he can't refuse. That deal fixes Jack's business problems, but his personal life spirals out of control. And, just when Jack realizes he can't live without Kelly, he may lose her forever.
author: Lori Ryan
